title: The Casino Played Him | Croupier | Clive Owen | Full Crime Thriller Movie

sources.title: The Casino Played Him | Croupier | Clive Owen | Full Crime Thriller Movie
sources.description:
The Casino Played Him | Croupier | Clive Owen | Full Crime Thriller Movie - Jack Manfred, (played by  Clive Owen) an aspiring writer struggling to find his way, takes a job as a croupier in a high-stakes casino. Drawn into the seductive world of gambling, Jackâ€™s life spirals as he becomes entangled with Jani, a desperate gambler planning a heist. With love, loyalty, and rules all at risk, Jack must navigate a dangerous game where every decision could cost him everything. A story of temptation, deception, and the deadly odds of chasing both fortune and desire.

1998.  Stars: Clive Owen, Nick Reding, Nicholas Ball
